attributes.background: Roads are a disgrace in erskine where I'm from many people damaging cars due to how big these are and me driving motorbike find it dangerous when riding in traffic due to not being able to see them till last minute

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Road repairs in Erskine are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
